channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Watch how this Singaporean artist uses AI to honor the ‘often misunderstood’ auntie
item.description: “The auntieverse is my way of honoring their everyday labor and to question my own attitude towards aging,” Niceaunties said at Brainstorm AI Singapor...

item.title: Ping An wants to turn China’s demographic crisis into an opportunity to showcase a ‘silver future’
item.description: The population in China is getting older—and wealthier, better educated, and more skilled. The company sees it as a business opportunity.

item.title: July 29 is National Chicken Wing Day. Here’s where to get free food

item.description: What happens when the "conscious unbossing" generation becomes the boss?

item.title: Meet the CIA-backed venture fund behind Palantir, Anduril—and a spy tool that might be on your phone
item.description: In-Q-Tel has brought Silicon Valley thinking to Washington's defense establishment—and funded a host of James Bond spy gadgets.
